posts.title: Aliens Scheduled To Abduct President
posts.author: C.P. Tenkirk
posts.details: Although we've pledged not to interfere, the present circumstances demand action. We are working on the necessary technology to beam him up!

posts.title: Aliens Need Great Hair
posts.author: D. Rump
posts.details: Hair is great. Aliens should have it. If you don't I can take over your planet and make your hair great again. Like mine.

posts.title: The Best Alien Vaction Sites
posts.author: L.S. Tinspace
posts.details: We like the dark side of the moon, especially when we are high and listening to Pink FLoyd.
